metadata.description: Anchor papers for ClaimGraph Knowledge Graph seeding
metadata.processing_order: priority ascending (1 = highest priority, process first)

anchor_papers.title: Global metabolic interaction network of the human gut microbiota for context-specific community-scale analysis
anchor_papers.notes: NJS16 network: ~570 microbial species, 4,400+ metabolic interactions. Foundational for gut microbiome systems biology.

anchor_papers.title: Deep generative models for single-cell RNA sequencing (scVI)
anchor_papers.notes: Introduced scVI variational autoencoder for scRNA-seq. Widely adopted, handles batch effects, dropout.

anchor_papers.title: Neural Message Passing for Quantum Chemistry
anchor_papers.notes: Introduced MPNN framework. Foundational for GNNs in molecular property prediction.

anchor_papers.title: Inferring Biological Networks by Sparse Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics
anchor_papers.notes: Implicit-SINDy for data-driven biological network inference. Applied to enzyme kinetics, bacterial regulation.

anchor_papers.title: Bayesian uncertainty analysis for complex systems biology models
anchor_papers.notes: Statistical emulation + history matching for high-dimensional parameter spaces in biology.

anchor_papers.title: Edge Attention-based Multi-Relational Graph Convolutional Networks (EAGCN)
anchor_papers.notes: GNN with edge attention for molecular property prediction. Multiple relationship types.

anchor_papers.title: Molecular Property Prediction: A Multilevel Quantum Interactions Modeling Perspective (MGCN)
anchor_papers.notes: Multilevel GCN capturing quantum-scale interactions. Handles equilibrium and off-equilibrium molecules.

anchor_papers.title: Modeling biological networks: from single gene systems to large microbial communities
anchor_papers.notes: Spans gene regulation to gut microbiota population models. Statistical properties of abundance distributions.

anchor_papers.title: HelixFold-Single: MSA-free Protein Structure Prediction by Using Protein Language Models
anchor_papers.notes: Single-sequence protein structure prediction. Combines PLM + AlphaFold2 modules. Faster inference.

anchor_papers.title: A joint model of unpaired data from scRNA-seq and spatial transcriptomics (gimVI)
anchor_papers.notes: Integrates spatial transcriptomics with scRNA-seq. Imputes missing genes in spatial data.

anchor_papers.title: Gut-Brain Axis as a Closed-Loop Molecular Communication Network
anchor_papers.notes: Models gut-brain axis with 6 coupled nonlinear DDEs. Information theory analysis of pathological states.

anchor_papers.title: Modeling and Analysis of SCFA-Driven Vagus Nerve Signaling in the Gut-Brain Axis via Molecular Communication
anchor_papers.notes: SCFA → vagal afferents → action potentials. Molecular communication framework for gut-brain signaling.

processing_notes.priority_1: Process first - foundational papers with high expected yield
processing_notes.priority_2: Process second - important but narrower scope
processing_notes.priority_3: Process last - recent/specialized, may have fewer citations to expand
